---
name: "DBC Research Ticket Template Kit - 12: Prep for sessions"
about: To guide the logistical tasks in preparation for conducting the study. 
labels: "disability-benenfits,research" 
assignees: ''

---

### Description
This ticket covers logistical tasks to prepare for conducting the [study name] study. The study focuses on [brief description of study]. 

These tasks need to be done before the first research session.

#### Timeframe for this ticket
This ticket should take well under a single sprint.

#### Outputs and artifacts
- [Link to observer sign-up sheet - add]
   - [Sign-up sheet template - Slack canvas](https://dsva.slack.com/docs/T03FECE8V/F09RKP7BMST)
   - [Sign-up list template - Slack list](https://dsva.slack.com/lists/T03FECE8V/F09UFTPKT8W?view_id=View09U2G23YSK)
      - The list goes within the canvas. There are additional instructions within both Slack templates
- [Link to SharePoint folder for session recordings - add]
- [Link to note-taking template - add]
- [Link to synthesis Mural - add _(if using)_]

### Tasks
**Notetaking prep**
- [ ] Create a folder on SharePoint for notes, recordings, and transcripts
- [ ] Make note-taking document/spreadsheet/Mural
   - Make it easy on your notetakers by creating a separate doc, tab, or area for each participant
   - Alternatively, create a template and let notetakers know how to find it
   - Consider any guidance you want to provide to notetakers, such as “things to look out for,” examples of notetaking hygiene (verbatim quotes), reminders about research goals/questions
   - If the notetaking document is not on SharePoint, add a big, highly visible reminder **not** to write down any PII or PHI
- [ ] Create a synthesis Mural, including an area for notes from daily debriefs. If you need inspiration, see the sample synthesis Murals listed below

**Get Zoom account ready**
- [ ] Test Zoom login from Perigean (each Moderator should do this)
- [ ] Change display name of Perigean Zoom account to "Moderator's_first_name (Moderator)"

**Scheduling**
- [ ] Make a sign-up sheet in a Slack canvas for notetakers and observers. You can use the [sign-up sheet template](https://dsva.slack.com/docs/T03FECE8V/F09RKP7BMST) for the sign-up sheet
   - You’ll also need [the embedded sign-up list template](https://dsva.slack.com/lists/T03FECE8V/F09UFTPKT8W?view_id=View09U2G23YSK) to create the embedded table
   - Make a copy of each so you don’t overwrite the template
- [ ] Post Slack messages letting people know sessions are available
- [ ] Perigean will create a temporary slack channel for the study
- [ ] Make sure the sessions listed on Perigean's recruiting spreadsheet are reflected in calendar invitations
- [ ] Forward calendar invitations to people who've signed up
- [ ] Schedule debrief sessions for each day, or after each session, and invite everyone who will have attended those sessions
- [ ] Send out messages to notetakers observers with the materials they will need for the session (research plan, notetaking document, link to the prototype, etc.)

### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Tasks listed above are complete
